Race.SpecificTitle: Law Enforcement District -- Parishwide - 10.87 Mill - Sheriff - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
LAW ENFORCEMENT DISTRICT PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10.87 MILL PROPERTY TAX OF THE LAW ENFORCEMENT DISTRICT OF THE PARISH OF WEST CARROLL FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING FINANCING TO THE OFFICE OF THE SHERIFF OF WEST CARROLL PARISH, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, CONSTRUCTING, ACQUIRING, IMPROVING, OPERATING AND MAINTAINING LAW ENFORCEMENT FACILITIES, VEHICLES AND EQUIPMENT AND PAYING SALARIES AND BENEFITS OF DEPUTIES.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten and eighty-seven hundredths (10.87) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of providing financing to the office of the Sheriff of West Carroll Parish, including but not limited to, constructing, acquiring, improving, operating and maintaining law enforcement facilities, vehicles and equipment and paying salaries and benefits of deputies?

Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
 (MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  5 YEAR, 6.08 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR GIVING ADDITIONAL SUPPORT TO THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall West Carroll Parish School District of the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a six and eight hundredths (6.08) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2011, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public schools in the District?
